remarks:
Addition of complex numbers is associative.  Axiom 9 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddass .  Proofs should normally use ~ addass instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Addition of complex numbers is associative.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axaddass .  Proofs should normally use ~ addass instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
statement: ax-addass $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A + B ) + C ) = ( A + ( B + C ) ) ) $.
